title: Oil Steadies After Four-Day Rally With Focus on Iran Meeting
description: Oil steadied after notching its biggest four-day gain in more than six months, as US officials planned to discuss Iran during a White House meeting.
content: Oil steadied after notching its biggest four-day gain in more than six months, as US officials planned to discuss Iran during a White House meeting.
